summary:
Manu Moreale, writing on his blog about how the digital world often reflects the physical one:

There was a time when forums were the cities of the web but now are more like small towns.  They’re the place where people congregate around shared interests.  Spend enough time on one and you’ll get to know its citizens...
title: Re: Places on the web
